item.title: Exploring Well Log Data Using the Welly Python Library
item.description: A look into a Python library dedicated to loading, exploring and plotting well log LAS files.

item.title: Using the missingno Python library to Identify and Visualise Missing Data Prior to Machine Learning
item.description: Real world data is messy. Data can have erroneous values, incorrect labels and many parts of it can be missing.
